S8E1.title: The One with Monica's Thunder
S8E1.des:
Monica excitedly reveals the good news of her
                engagement to everyone -- but Rachel and Ross upstage her by reuniting.

S8E2.title: The One with Rachel's Book
S8E2.des:
Joey finds out that Rachel is reading a steamy
                romance novel. Monica discovers that her parents have spent the money for her wedding on a beach
                house.

S8E3.title: The One with Phoebe's Cookies
S8E3.des:
Monica becomes obsessed with acquiring Phoebe's
                secret, delicious cookie recipe. Joey accepts Rachel's help with sailing.

S8E4.title: The One with Rachel's Assistant
S8E4.des:
Rachel wants to hire a cute, young male
                assistant over a more qualified woman. Joey's show gets cancelled.

S8E5.title: The One with the Engagement Picture
S8E5.des:
Joey tries to teach Chandler how to smile for an
                engagement picture with Monica. Joey takes Tag out for a good time.

S8E6.title: The One with the Nap Partners
S8E6.des:
Rachel and Phoebe compete to be Monica's maid of
                honor -- but Monica doesn't want to make the decision.

S8E7.title: The One with Ross' Library Book
S8E7.des:
Ross discovers that his dissertation is in a
                section of the library where students go to have sex. Rachel and Phoebe meddle in Joey's
                relationship.

S8E8.title: The One Where Chandler Doesn't Like Dogs
S8E8.des:
Chandler's irrational fear of dogs causes
                problems when Phoebe brings home a cute canine. Rachel's assistant gives her a Thanksgiving
                surprise.

S8E9.title: The One with All the Candy
S8E9.des:
Monica becomes popular with her neighbors
                because of her homemade candy. Phoebe decides to learn to ride a bicycle.

S8E10.title: The One with the Holiday Armadillo
S8E10.des:
Ross dresses up as the Holiday Armadillo and,
                with Monica, Chandler and Joey's help, teaches Ben about Chanukah.

S8E11.title: The One with All the Cheesecakes
S8E11.des:
Chandler and Rachel can't help eating the
                irresistible cheesecakes intended for a neighbor. Phoebe's former boyfriend returns for one night
                only.

S8E12.title: The One Where They're Up All Night
S8E12.des:
Monica falls asleep during sex. Rachel argues
                with Tag. Ross and Joey get stranded on the roof.

S8E13.title: The One Where Rosita Dies
S8E13.des:
Phoebe becomes involved with a suicidal office
                worker. Rachel breaks Joey's favorite chair. Monica's beloved childhood belongings are destroyed.

S8E14.title: The One Where They All Turn Thirty
S8E14.des:
Rachel's 30th birthday prompts the friends to
                reminisce about their own 30th birthdays.

S8E15.title: The One with Joey's New Brain
S8E15.des:
Joey's character on a daytime drama becomes more
                prominent -- to the chagrin of the show's diva star.

S8E16.title: The One with the Truth About London
S8E16.des:
Chandler finds out who Monica really wanted to
                have sex with on the night they became lovers. Ross is mad after Rachel teaches Ben practical jokes.

S8E17.title: The One with the Cheap Wedding Dress
S8E17.des:
Monica battles another shopper for the perfect
                wedding dress. Ross and Joey compete for the same woman.

S8E18.title: The One with Joey's Award
S8E18.des:
Joey overreacts at a daytime drama awards show.
                Ross deals with a male student who says he's in love with him.

S8E19.title: The One with Ross and Monica's Cousin
S8E19.des:
Monica's gorgeous cousin unwittingly wreaks
                havoc on Chandler and Ross. Rachel and Phoebe hastily plan a surprise bridal party for Monica.

S8E20.title: The One with Rachel's Big Kiss
S8E20.des:
Rachel reveals a titillating secret about her
                and a former sorority sister. Ross and Chandler compete for wedding tuxedos.

S8E21.title: The One with the Vows
S8E21.des:
As Monica and Chandler prepare their wedding
                vows, everyone reminisces.

S8E22.title: The One with Chandler's Dad
S8E22.des:
Chandler confronts his estranged, cross-dressing
                father. Rachel gets into trouble driving Monica's Porsche.

S8E23.title:
The One with Chandler and Monica's Wedding:
                    Part 1
S8E23.des:
As the relatives gather for Monica and
                Chandler's wedding, Chandler finally realizes the magnitude of what he's doing.

S8E24.title:
The One with Chandler and Monica's Wedding:
                    Part 2
S8E24.des:
Monica remains blissfully unaware of the
                potential disasters on her wedding day.

year:
Monica and Chandler prepare for their wedding but must
            deal with a competition between Rachel and Phoebe to be Monica's maid of honor.
about:
Monica and Chandler prepare for their wedding but must
            deal with a competition between Rachel and Phoebe to be Monica's maid of honor.
